channel.title: Reaper Menu missing images
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Reaper Menu missing images" - Just commenting on an error in the wiki-coding for that page, and listing the fix.

item.title: Reaper Menu missing images
item.content:encoded:
The page of Reaper Menu is supposed to have all 4 Reaper Blood images, but only has one, Cobra Kai, because the other three link to non-existent files.
If someone could please go in and remove the number 2 from directly before the .jpg in all three of the other file names, they would work properly.
I would go in and do so myself, but my current character has not been active long enough for me to join and edit.
Example:
Reaper_Blood_-_Dormant2.jpg
should just be
Reaper_Blood_-_Dormant.jpg

The Cobrai Kai image has a 2 in the name, but that file exists— I assume someone tried to change all 4, not realizing only one of them was named that way.
Thanks much!
—Ariamaki
